text: Kintu yadi tara tomara sathe hujjata kare, tabe balo -- ''ami sampurnarupe allah‌ra dike amara mukha ruju karechi, ara yara amaya anusarana kare.’’ Ara tadera balo yadera kitaba deya hayeche ara niraksaradera, ''tomara ki a‌tmasamarpana karecha?’’ Ata'eba yadi tara a‌tmasamarpana kare tabe abasya'i tara hedayataprapta habe, ara yadi tara phire yaya tabe nihsandeha tomara upare hacche paumche deya. Ara allah bandadera darsaka.
